title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.762 - Ham spread, tongue spread, and similar products
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.762 - Ham spread, tongue spread, and similar products

State Regulations
"Ham Spread", "Tongue Spread" and similar products
shall contain not less than 50 percent of the meat ingredient named, computed
on the weight of the fresh meat. Other meat and fat may be used to give the
desired spreading consistency provided it does not detract from the character
of the spreads named. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
319.762

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
